exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_n_const (Derive_n (fun _ : R => _) (S _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.
The LHS of Derive_n_comp (Derive_n (Derive_n _ _) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H2 : forall (f : R -> R) (n m : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (Derive_n f m) n x = Derive_n f (n + m) x H1 : forall (n : nat) (a x : R), Derive (Derive_n (fun _ : R => a) n) x = 0 f : R -> R n : nat a, x : R IHn : Derive_n (fun y : R => f y * a) n x = Derive_n f n x * a Unable to unify "Derive (Derive_n f n) x * a" with "Derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => f y * a) n) x".

original: induction n. - simpl. rewrite Derive_n_const. simpl. ring. - simpl. rewrite Derive_n_comp. rewrite IHn. reflexivity.
